summary: NO OTHER MODS REQUIRED. Powerful Mage. My first mod ever so I hope all goes well :D
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/26369-0-1445445059.jpg[/img]

First off I would like to give a BIG SPECIAL THANKS TO [color=red]DARKNITE50[/color]!

Without Darknite50's help my mod would have stayed broken. So if you like this mod, endorse it AND give Darknite50 kudos!

Meet Midnight, a powerful Mage who is of unknown origin, who you can find at THE DRUNKEN HUNTSMAN IN WHITERUN.
She is the CBBE v3 bodytype.

[color=yellow]THIS IS MY FIRST MOD EVER[/color], and depending on how everything turns out, I might upload my other characters. I did the face tattoo myself :D

I'm new to modding so I'm open to advice from people who know what they are doing;D

I learned how to make Standalone followers from natilde's tutorial on how to create standalone NPC's... and you can find it here- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25673]Creating Standalone NPCs[/url]
So I guess natilde is like my un-oficial teacher.... Thanks.

When you find Midnight in Whiterun's The Drunken Huntsmen, she will be nude because I didn't put any default gear on her.

A BIG SPECIAL THANKS TO CALIENTE FOR HER BODY MOD FOUND HERE- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition[/url]

and another thanks to her for giving advice and answering questions.

A SPECIAL THANKS TO APACHII FOR THE BEST HAIR MOD FOUND HERE- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

without this certain hairstyle I don't think Midnight would look like ... well Midnight :D

AND A BIG SPECIAL THANKS TO chriXz FOR THE BODY TATTOO MOD NAMED TATTO SKINS HD.... I would give the link but there is no link to it any more... I'm not sure if its hidden or what.

And thanks to besthesda for making a wonderful game.

And thanks to all the great modders out there for making great mods.... and people... if a modder makes a good mod, you should always go back to their page and show support by endorsing. Thanks

Installation: Just use NMM or you can click the manual install and drag the files to the correct paths of your Skyrim Data folder.

[color=yellow]PERMISSIONS[/color]

Please feel free to use my mod any way you like as long as YOU GIVE ME CREDIT AND PROVIDE A LINK TO MY PAGE. THANKS.


[color=yellow]CREDITS[/color]

Me.

Darknite50 for taking the time to make my mod work properly.

Caliente for the best body mod out.

Apachii for the best hair mod out.

chriXz for the best tattoo mod out.

Bethesda for one of the best games out.

[color=yellow][size=+2]And please check out my other standalone follower mods-[/size][/color]

[color=red]Oblivion[/color].
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43187/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/43187-1-1389598005.jpg[/img][/url]

and [color=purple]Victoria[/color]- FIRST standalone follower EVER to have [color=purple]GLOWING EYES[/color].
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44969/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/44969-1-1389598781.jpg[/img][/url]

and [color=yellow]Ra[/color].

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50721/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/50721-1-1391470816.jpg[/img][/url]

And check out my Spell Mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50868/?]Atom Bomb - Ultra Powerful Spell[/url]

[color=yellow][size=+2]Thanks to everyone who supports my mods.[/size][/color] :)


[color=yellow]AND YOU ARE WELCOME TO UPLOAD YOUR PICTURES EVERYONE. Enjoy![/color]
author: automatik25
